allow_applicaton_error_collection.message: Allow alkasir to send applicaion error logs to Alkasir to find bugs and make the service better.

allow_extended_analysis.message: Allow alkasir to use this computers internet connection to run additional censorship detection tests.

app_docs_name.description: Label for the docs app, used for navigation and page titles.

app_home_name.description: Label for the home app, used for navigation and page titles.

app_settings_name.description: Label for the settings app, used for navigation and page titles.

app_suggest_name.description: Label for the suggest url app, used for navigation and page titles.

blocklist_update_error_message.message: Failed to update list of blocked hosts

blocklist_update_init_message.message: Checking for updates on blocked sites

blocklist_update_warning_message.message: Having trouble updating the block list, retrying...

browser_code_explain.message: The browser code is required to enable Alkasir in web browser. Copy it to the clip board now, you will be asked for it after installing the browser extension.

browser_integration_chrome_success.message: An active chrome extension is detected

browser_integration_firefox_success.message: An active firefox extension is detected

central_error_message.message: Cannot establish connection to the central server.

central_warning_message.message: Having trouble reaching the alkasir server, retrying..

checking.description: This will be displayed on the check button while it's checking.

connection_string_help.message: Short information on what the connection string is...

export_browser_extension_message.message: Saves the browser extension to disk if the chrome web store isn't reachable.

export_debuginfo_message.message: Exports a file used for debugging alkasir, do NOT send this file to anyone you don't know for sure is working with alkasir, this file might contains personal information such as you IP address, sites you reported or visited using alkasir since alkasir was last started.

ext_browser_code_field_help.message: If you do not have the browser code, right click on the alkasir tray or dock icon and choose 'copy browser code' first

ext_browser_code_msg_client_conn_error.message: Cannot connect to client. If it is running, get a new browser code to try to reconnect.

ext_browser_code_msg_client_newer_error.message: Alkasir is running a newer version that this chrome extension requires, it should update automatically. Check chrome settings to verify that extensions can be updated.

ext_browser_code_msg_client_older_error.message: The alkasir version running on your computer is older that this browser extension, it should upgrade automatically.

extension_client_not_available_message.message: Ensure that the Alkasir client is started.

extension_client_not_avialable_open_brow.description: Shown in the browser extension popup window followed by a continue button that opens the options page in a browser tab
extension_client_not_avialable_open_brow.message: If the client is running, the browser code might be invalid. Open the browser extension options page to reverify the settings.

extension_description.description: For chrome webstore and extensions page

extension_name.description: For chrome webstore and extensions page

extension_options.description: For chrome popup icon right click access to extension options menu

listen_error_title.message: Alkasir cannot listen on configured port

location_setup_required.message: Location settings are missing, alkasir needs to be setup before it can be used.

network_connected_message.message: Alkasir has detected an internet connection to the internet, activating...

network_error_message.message: Alkasir cannot detect an working internet connection, it will remain inactiveuntil an internet connection is available.

network_timeout_error_message.message: The network request timed out, try again later.

notifications.description: Label for the home app heading.

notify_option_transport_conn_opened.message: Alkasir being used to circumvent a specific site

notify_type_desktop.description: Used for notification settings. This option enabled desktop notifications.

notify_type_icon.description: Used for notification settings. This option enabled notifications by flashing either the tray/dock icon ir browser extension icon (unspecified).

restore_default_settings.description: Used on settings pages to restore default values

server_error_message.description: A last resort generic error type, probably not used.
server_error_message.message: The server responeded with an error:

server_error_title.description: A last resort generic error type, probably not used.

setup.description: Header for first time setup guide

setup_required_title.description: Title for notification telling user that Alkasir needs to be configured

suggest_denied_message.message: Cirvumenvting this URL is not supported by Alkasir.

suggest_details.message: The following data will be sent to alkasir for analysis

suggest_done_message.message: The request was submitted, try loading the page again to access it.

suggest_explain_short.message: You are submitting an url to alkasir so that it can be accessed and analysed...

suggest_not_blocked_message.message: This submitted URL is currently not detected as being blocked by Alkasir.

suggest_this_message.message: Report problems viewing $URL$ to alkasir to unlock it...

transport_connections_message.message: Enable, disable, add and remove configured connections.

suggest_this_title.message: I'm having troubles accessing this site....

transport_connected_message.message: Alkasir has established a transport connection.

transport_error_message.message: Alkasir could not connect to network transport.

transport_init_message.message: Alkasir has initiated a new transport connection

transported_connection_opened_message.message: Alkasir is used for accessing this server because it is listed as being blocked in your region.

upgrade_info.description: Besides the application upgrade button under settings.
upgrade_info.message: Alkasir will restart automatically after upgrade is completed.

upgrading.description: an upgrade button's label is replaced with this when an upgrade is in action

working.description: A placeholder that will be replaced when content is avialable
